attributes.comment:
My husband and I are in the process of adopting a child from China. Due to the
current increasing wait times of child referral, our form I-171H will expire and need
to be renewed prior to travel to China. Adoption isn't a cheap endeaver, having to
pay the fees twice is already a burden but to have a rate increase only further
increases that financial burden. Would it not be more prudent to extend the
expiration date on the I-171H and fingerprints so that the already overworked
government employees don't have repetitive and redundant work to do?e
Please take those of us adopting with 17-18 month referral wait lines in
consideration and extend the expiration date instead of making us pay over twice
the amount of everyone else.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Amy R. Raynes
